org.ngi

Class NodeInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ngi.Element
      • org.ngi.NodeTile
        • org.ngi.NodeInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnyInput, AssignmentInput, BooleanInput, ChildrenInput, ConnVariableInput, ExpressionInput, ExpressionInputAny, FragmentSpecInput, NumberInput, OperationInput, SetInput, StaticBooleanInput, StaticExpressionInput, StaticFileNameInput, StaticNumberInput, StaticVariableInput, VariableInput, VectorInInput, VectorInput

    public class NodeInput
extends NodeTile
implements java.io.Serializable
    Base Class for all Node Inputs. This is the Node Input tile that handles connections, static values, and compatibility testing with NodeOutputs.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isOutputCompatible

        public boolean isOutputCompatible(DataType dtOut)
        Test only the data type here. This should be overridden in subclasses. It returns false here.
        Parameters:
        dtOut - DataType DataType of output
        Returns:
        boolean true if Output and Input data types are compatible, false otherwise.

      • isOutputCompatible

        public boolean isOutputCompatible(NodeOutput output)
        Main compatibility Test
        Parameters:
        output - NodeOutput to test for connection compatibility.
        Returns:
        true if NodeOutput can be connected to this NodeInput, false if incompatible.

      • isCircularReference

        public boolean isCircularReference(NodeOutput output)
        Check for Circular reference. This has to be called before a connection is attempted.
        Parameters:
        output - NodeOutput to test.
        Returns:
        True if the proposed connection will create a circular reference, false otherwise.
